title: Meet Dr. Robert Kachko
author: S P
description: Meet Dr Robert Kachko, skilled Naturopathic Doctor & Licensed Acupuncturist at NY Center for Integrative Health in Manhattan & Stamford
cleaned_text: Meet Dr. Robert Kachko Dr. Robert Kachko (Naturopathic Doctor, Licensed Acupuncturist) is the Founder and Director of NY Center for Integrative Health. An expert in addressing mental health conditions, chronic pain, and digestive disorders, he has developed a comprehensive biopsychosocial methodology for people dealing with chronic disease. As a leader in the fields of Naturopathic and Integrative Medicine, Dr. Kachko advocates for a holistic approach to healthcare reform. He's Immediate Past President of the American Association of Naturopathic Physicians (AANP). A native of New York, he has also served on the Board of Directors of the New York Association of Naturopathic Physicians and the Integrative Health Policy Consortium. Dr. Kachko graduated Summa Cum Laude with a Doctoral Degree in Naturopathic Medicine and a Master's Degree in Acupuncture from the University of Bridgeport College of Naturopathic Medicine and Acupuncture Institute. He has authored or co-authored several textbook chapters in the areas of mental health conditions, digestive disorders, and neurological conditions. Dr. Kachko is also past Co-Founder and CEO of TribeRx, a biopsychosocial approach to chronic pain that utilizes peer support and technology. Holding several advisory positions on non-profit and for-profit boards in the fields of precision medicine and Alzheimer's disease, Dr. Kachko works to expand research and awareness of holistic approaches to optimal wellness. When not working, he loves to spend time in nature with his family and friends, exploring the forests, trails and lakes of Upstate New York. Post-Graduate Trainings / Certifications - Somatic Experiencing Trauma Institute - Accelerated Resolution Therapy - American Society of Clinical Hypnosis - HeartMath Biofeedback Certification - Carrick Institute Pain Neurology Program - Liaoning University of Traditional Chinese Medicine (China) Professional Memberships - American Association of Naturopathic Physicians (Past President) - New York Association of Naturopathic Physicians (Past Board Member) - Connecticut Naturopathic Physicians Association Hi I'm Doctor Robert Kachko and Welcome to New York Centre for Integrative Health. Our clinic is truly unique in that we spend a lot of time understanding who you are and where you've been. Our goal at our clinic is to work with you to come up with a comprehensive treatment plan and together to find a path forward to Sustainably heal from your chronic condition. At our clinic It's really important to us that each patient feels heard and understood, and though everyone has a unique experience and a unique story that brought them through our doors. What's most important Is that we work together to create a plan that honours who you are and where you've been. Your treatment plan might consist of naturopathic medicine, acupuncture, mind, body medicine, Ivy therapy, comprehensive diagnostic techniques, but no matter what, the focus is always on you and your unique needs.
